name: Assia: Returning to Dreams
description: Assia:Returning to Dreams "is a 3D jumping parkour game. Is the lonely temple in the snow-white world, strange sculptures that resemble oneself, magnified objects, escaping or returning to a dream? In order to return to her village, Assia embarked on her own journey.

name: Jump Tracks
description: Action! Danger! Coins! What more could you want from a game?! Jump Tracks is a game all about timing and reflexes. Zoom off the tracks, clear each level, and try not to die along the way in this tiny and twitchy arcade tapper. It's harder than it looks! Good luck!

name: Only Climb: Better Together
description: Tired of sitting on the ground? Take a sky-high journey with your friends in Only Climb: Better Together! Touch the clouds with your own hands and find out what's behind them, but remember, there are no easy paths…

name: Onka
description: Explore the mansion and escape in this 3D horror game. Solve the riddles and escape from the ghosts that roam the mansion!

name: We Carry the Fire
description: We Carry the Fire is a fantasy-adventure visual novel about an apocalyptic curse, a magical forest, losing everything, and finding a reason to keep going.

name: Speard
description: Speard is a fast paced platformer. Beat levels as fast as you can. Traverse your way through vast worlds with only a Spear and a Rocket Jump.

name: Gravity Crash Portable
description: Retro fun meets futuristic thrills in space shooter Gravity Crash Portable. Blast aliens across 30 hostile planets in stellar missions filled to the brim with wormholes, laser beams and amazing explosions. The battle for the stars has begun – download Gravity Crash Portable today and prepare for lift-off.

name: WWE 2K23: Revel with Wyatt Pack
description: The Revel with Wyatt Pack includes the franchise return of Bray Wyatt, along with Zeus, Valhalla, Joe Gacy, Blair Davenport & bonus Superstar, Uncle Howdy. Each playable Superstar comes with their own MyFACTION card. The Revel with Wyatt Pack is included with the WWE 2K23 Season Pass.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Graffiti Tactical: Pro Pack
description: Get Call of Duty Points* and in-game content for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II and Warzone.

name: Arcade Archives: King & Balloon
description:
"KING & BALLOON" is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1980.
Shoot down the swarms of balloons that are coming to steal the king!
The game will continue so long as the king isn't fully taken away into the sky, no matter how many times your cannon is destroyed.
You can also rescue the king as the balloons take him by shooting them down and rescuing him before he goes away.

name: Scavenger Hunt: Italy
description:
In Scavenger Hunt: Italy you have to solve different puzzles to reach the goal. The puzzles lead you across Italy in different levels.
To master the levels and the puzzles you need internet access and a web browser!
The game will be available in English and German.

name: The Gravity Trickster
description: Defy gravity and traverse tricky 3D platforms and mind-bending challenges as you navigate your robot to the end of each level, collecting keys, coins, cosmic cubes and more as you go!

name: Pumpkin Panic
description:
Explore this little farm in the middle of the forest, plant crops, take care of the plants, go fishing, or whatever you prefer, but have a good time!

But be careful, they say that strange things are happening in the area...

name: Recalhorn
description: Play as a young boy and his white creature pet as you progress through sidescrolling levels using a magic flute or jumping on enemies to defeat them and gather fruit for points. Along the way, you characters will befriend animals which can be summoned and ridden bestowing new powers to both defeat enemies and traverse the land. At the end of each world, youll face a boss character. Your player has 5 hearts per life. This game ran on Taitos F3 system and was tested in arcades, but never officially released. Several prototype carts were released into the wild.

name: Eggwolf: Office Eggscape
description: The fiscal earnings report is due tomorrow, and it's already late. Get the job done, complete tasks from your coworkers, and avoid the killer Eggwolf. Estimated 20-30 minutes of playtime.

name: Bluey: The Videogame
description:
Join the fun with Bluey and her family in Bluey: The Videogame! Play a brand-new story set across 4 interactive adventures. For the first time ever, explore iconic locations such as the Heeler House, Playgrounds, Creek and a bonus beach location. Play your favourite games from the TV show, including Keepy Uppy, Chattermax Chase, and more!

The fun doesn't stop there! This game won't be trifficult, just a lot of fun. Experience the joy and wonder of Bluey's world, with local multiplayer you can play with friends and family in story mode and free play! Explore and collect items for your sticker book, unlock outfits and uncover the many secrets and hidden references throughout each location. Recreate iconic scenes or create your very own Bluey inspired adventures and games in Bluey: The Videogame.

name: Ruby: Huntress of Vale
description: Ruby: Huntress of Vale is an alternate universe fan project centered around a 2D action beat-em-up game. This project is based on the web series RWBY originally by Monty Oum & Rooster Teeth.

name: Baskin-Robbins: Enter the Flavour-Verse
description: Baskin-Robbins: Enter the Flavour-Verse was a web game based on the movie Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse. The game was made as a part of Australia's promotional campaign for the movie.

name: Engineer's Last Stand
description:
You've been left alone to delay the inevitable death by the alien horde with your turret building skills. Place turrets and dodge the monsters to survive as long as you can in this satisfying action game.

Created in FTE QuakeWorld engine in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 50.

name: Mortal Kombat: Outworld Assassins
description:
Mortal Kombat Outworld Assassins is a fan made game based on Mortal Kombat Mythologies: Sub-Zero game, but with a lot of fan made plot stuff.

In this game you play as Sub-Zero, Scorpion or Noob Saibot, and it's a prequel story, that tells the origin of those 3 characters before the tournament. And like i said above, the story is fan made, and thus everything that you see here is made up.

The gameplay is basically in beat'em up style, where you running around different locations, beating up bad guys and fighting with bosses. But, there is some extra stuff to it, like you can use some super moves and special moves, and also you can do a fatalities on bosses and enemies when they are low on health. But you can check that out in "How to play" option in the game itself.

name: Build-A-Delivery
description: You take the role of a delivery driver in a small desert village, moving packages from one villager to another and getting paid for it. Unfortunately the company car is quite bare bones and it's your job to install parts to it and figure out how to carry packages in it, essentially building your own delivery car.

name: Streets of Rage 2X
description: Remake of the famous Beat 'Em Up series. The remaster features improved artificial intelligence, high resolution and frame rate, new abilities, the ability to block, aerial combo attacks, and much more. Of the innovations, the developers note a cooperative mode for up to 4 people.

name: Escape From Lighthouse
description: Escape from Lighthouse of the vast universe. You are in a space prison called "Lighthouse" of space. A human experiment will be conducted. Escape from Lighthouse as you progress through a growing variety of experiments

name: Ludo Park
description: Ludo Park is a serious business simulation focused on management and entrepreneurship, in which the player controls a stand-in at a local amusement park for one month, creating his own character and business identity.

name: Hello Girl
description: Hello Girl is visual novel about connection and disconnection. It's about the love of places and the futility of trying. It's about knowing your place, yet still feeling lost.

name: Minecraft: Classic Skin Pack 5
description: Sin descripción

name: Minecraft: Biome Settlers 3 Skin Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Ottomax
description: Ottomax is a game that emulates the entrepreneurship atmosphere, where the player gets to know and practice his entrepreneurial abilities by interacting with the story and deciding on the daily routine of the protagonist trying to make the company successful.

name: Ilha do Empreendedor
description: Ilha do Empreendedor is an educational business simulator focused on the five steps to opening new companies: opportunity analysis, planning, gathering resources, investment, and opening. Three players play against each other trying to be the most successful business manager in a board game play style.

name: Sign of Torment
description:
Sign of Torment is unique in comparison to mainstream wads, so it might be something that was never done before.

It utilizes features not commonly used in Boom maps, like silent teleports, friction, or jumppads.
The wad follows usage of red, white and black colors through episodes. To put simply the main theme color in Episode 1 is red, in Episode 2 is white,
and in Episode 3 is black. ﻿

name: Need For Speed Pro Street Pepega Edition
description:
The Ultimate Meme Mod is BACK!
The second installment of the Pepega Mod is finally here, taking you straight into the renewed legal street racing scene of ProStreet!
Black Box’s underappreciated gem from 2007 has been given a complete overhaul featuring an entirely new story with live action cutscenes, over 80 new cars from various regions and eras, new gameplay mechanics and much more!

name: Chainworm Kommando
description: Just a set of highly detailed small to medium large maps, mostly inspired by shooter classics of the 90s.

name: Break Point
description: Welcome to Break Point, a 9-map Doom II UDMF episode featuring colorful 3D environments from some of the best and brightest of modern GZDoom mappers.

name: Elysium's Curse
description:
This is my new wad, containing 6 maps. It uses Otex textures by @ukiro. It also features custom tree sprites (by @elend and @Negatronica) which really puts the icing on the cake as far as looks go. Also, that nice blue sky is by @Mechadon taken from "boxoskies-v3". MIDI's are by @AD_79, which I felt fit the theme very well.

Gameplay is mostly strategic with occasional mild slaughter elements. Maps are generally short, tough and fast-paced.

Difficulty-wise, I've tried my best to cater for most players... I wouldn't say UV is ultra hard but it can be rage-inducing without the right care. HMP is much more oriented for fun, although still challenging in parts. HNTR is a walk in the park.

Pistol starts are possible, but I personally think continuous play is a lot of fun for this wad!

name: Tetanus
description: Tetanus is a vanilla compatible episode for Doom 2, centered around clean, easily readable level design, with visuals inspired by "orange-box" designs from various source engine games, as well as Super Mario Odyssey's "Steam Gardens." Tetanus also features an almost entirely bespoke soundtrack with midis by AD_79, and ZeMystic, among others.

name: TV1998
description: 22 maps for Doom2 I made back in 1998.

name: Mexican High School Simulator
description:
Mexican School Simulator is an anime style school simulator based on the schools of Mexico, the artistic design of the school is based on a real institution, it combines Sandbox, adventure, platformer, mystery, terror and RPG gameplay.

At the beginning of the game you will have your own house, your car and the opportunity to study in this prestigious school.Enter the life of a Mexican student, walk the halls of this school interact with the various students, drive a car, perform various academic activities and have fun.

Explore each classroom of the school, get ready to go back to class also explore a small part of the city of Tepic Nayarit, take a walk around here, and enjoy the graphics that have been optimized for smartphones. And don't forget to investigate the mysteries of this school.

name: Rogue Company: ViVi Starter Pack
description: The ViVi Starter Pack features everything you need to jump into the action. Gear up - things are about to get loud!

name: Active Defense
description: This is a strategy tower defense game where players need to choose the appropriate defense towers based on different maps and enemies. The game also offers a variety of defense towers, maps, and an endless mode waiting to be unlocked by the players!

name: Out of Fuel
description: Out of Fuel is an exciting and challenging game that puts you in control of a powerful chainsaw as you work to completely destroy various objects.

name: Path to the Devil
description: A replayable rouge like deck building game in an RPG environment. Travel down a path across an island to face the devil. Build a strong deck on the way by taking out the devil's mercenary army and completing various non combatant encounters.

name: Mystery Box: The Journey
description: Welcome to the 4th chapter of the popular 'Mystery Box' puzzle game series! 10 new boxes full of enigmas to crack are waiting for you on this journey through lost worlds.

name: Tunnel Ball 3D
description:
The fastest and most furious 3D Tunnel game on the AppStore.
Roll your galactic ball down the 3D tunnel at light speed. Avoid obstacles and grab space treasures to maximize your scores.

name: Top Gear: Stunt School HD
description: If you strapped a jet engine to a racing car would you be able to make it jump 100ft into the air? Possibly... and in Top Gear Stunt School you can try this plus loads more ridiculous stunts. There are over two billion different combinations of upgrades and add-ons that you can use to modify your car to try to beat the challenges!

name: Tiny Ring
description:
Rev your engine and get ready for the ultimate test of speed and nerve - Tiny Ring!
The brakes are gone! Timing is everything as you guide your speeding race car around the tiny ring track with a single finger. How many laps can you handle?
So simple anyone can have a go, but only one can stand victorious a-top the Game Center leaderboard for completing most laps. Will it be you?
Fame and glory can be yours.

name: Space Invaders: World Defense
description:
Space Invaders have returned to conquer the world, this time from a different dimension.
Join the World Defense team to find, and defeat Space Invaders in your neighborhood.
As a member of the elite pilot force, you’ll defend your area from invasion in a first-of-its-kind immersive game experience.
Engage in missions across dimensions from Augmented Reality to the parallel Invader world.

name: Speedy Biker Xtreme
description:
Tilt your way to victory! An all new version of your favorite bike game is here!
Race against the computer, or challenge a friend with real-time head-2-head.
Speedy Biker 3 features 18 new track locations across the globe complete with bone-jarring jumps, dizzying whoop-de-doos, ramps, mud, and obstacles galore.

name: Squish the Zombies
description: Sin descripción

name: Monkey Flight 2
description: Your favorite monkeys are back! This time they've carried their elastic, whippy, inflatable palm tree to THREE new places for more monkey-flinging fun.

name: Final Freeway
description: Fast-paced old-school pure arcade racer.

name: FastBall 2
description:
In FastBall, you control a rolling ball. In his way, there are many obstacles and his only ability is to jump. This is where he needs you, you'll make him jump by tapping the screen.
With this simple mechanic, FastBall 2 contains 145 action packed levels spawned across 5 level packs. Through the levels, you'll need a good timing, pure attention as well as decisions on which path to follow to reach the level end.

name: Chronology: Deluxe Edition
description: A platform-adventure game about time travelling, puzzle solving and a friendship between an Old Inventor and a Snail.

name: Blazing Snake
description: Blazing Snake is a fun, fast paced, video game inspired by classic arcade style games.

name: Bacterial Takeover - Idle game
description:
The most unique and addictive of the idle clicker games is here!
Become tycoon of deadly bacteria and take over the Universe. This idle clicker game will take you on a new space journey. Expand and grow big numbers of bacteria with enchantments in idle production and rare minerals. Take on the challenge and discover the best gameplay and idle strategy to destroy as many planets as possible!

name: 3D Tan
description:
AR ball vs bricks numbers, Don't you like to try?
"3D Tan" is a real 3d physical collision arcade game.
It is easy to learn: drag or click to fire balls. You can continue to fire your balls.
Collect props and stars to increase your ball amount or size.
Break bricks to get scores.

name: Skeljump
description: Experience the puzzle genre from a different perspective in this game! You must solve puzzles that get more complex as you progress by managing time well, using your reflexes and memory to overcome the challenges!

name: Bird Ball
description: You scream out and all your friends rush to their computers to fire up the next big thing in online multiplayer video game entertainment. Play with friends or alone and spawn in some friendly bird compatriots to play with or against. The aim is to score goals and have fun in the sandbox.

name: Only Down!
description: Have game developers often forced you to climb somewhere with no purpose? This time, your goal is to hit rock bottom and nothing else. It should be simple enough, good luck to everyone.

name: JustWatchMyCat
description: It's a cat puzzle game that solves using the direction of gravity.

name: Chamber of Hex
description: A 15-minute puzzle adventure game on a 9x12 sheet of paper. Explore rooms, figure out the secret codes and escape the chamber!

name: Legend Creatures 2
description: Legend Creatures 2, sequel to the acclaimed strategy franchise created by the same solo dev, is a fun treat combining roguelike and auto battler gameplay. Recruit and evolve fantastical creatures with divine weapons to defeat the demon lord in the vast map. Modding support coming later!

name: Atominous
description:
Inspect every inch of a contaminated household.
Quarantine hazardous materials.
Encounter residents.
Put yourself in danger.
Be a professional.

name: End of Edge
description: End of Edge is a hardcore wuxia action game

name: Keepers
description: Keepers is a space-themed clicker game. You are an employee of a center tasked with saving a planet - a typical light-year.

name: Danny Phantom: Ghost Frenzy
description:
Help Danny Phantom stop Vlad Plasmius, his arch-enemy, and his evil plan. Halt the ghost invasion with Danny's full Fenton Ghost-Hunting arsenal!

Very similar game mechanics to the developer Wildfire Studio's other game Tumblebugs (2005).

name: KnightMan
description: Knight Man is a 2d Pixel-art retro style platformer. Play As Knightman, a heroic warrior who has taken it upon himself to save the 5 realms from the clutches of evil. Traverse through 20 hand-crafted levels across 5 unique zones, each populated by a variety of enemies and hazards.

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles
description: "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" bring the whimsical world of gnomes to life! Discover the magic as you assemble pieces featuring vibrant, enchanting gnome realms. Ideal for both kids and adults, these puzzles offer a unique blend of challenge and charm. Perfect for a cozy evening indoors!

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 2
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 1
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: Jungo
description:
Help Chase the Cheetah rescue his jungle friends in this unique and colorful puzzler.

The villainous vulture Vargas has unleashed a shadowy spell and trapped all the animals in bright bubbles. Using cat-like reflexes and a keen eye for color, arrange the colored bubbles into matching groups to free the captive creatures.

name: Ecila
description: Lord of knives.

name: Revenge of the 'Gator: Gold
description: A big overhaul of Revenge of the 'Gator adding colors and fixes. It also includes improvements such as score saving and a double speed mode with no slowdowns.

name: Irang: The Last Hope
description: In Joseon, a kingdom honoring the Four Deities, chaos reigns. Nobles have unleashed sealed evils in a power grab, causing calamities. Join Irang and Haru on a journey to liberate the Deities and reclaim Joseon's last hope.

name: Cybersecurity Ethics Scavenger Hunt
description: An educational, interactive 'I Spy' game. Visit locations, find objects, and solve ethical dilemmas using your cybersecurity experience.

name: Adversary Tower
description: The evil wizard has used a poisonous potion to pollute the village's water supply. You must use the 7 steps of your Adversarial Thinking training to infiltrate his tower, steal back the potion of purity, and safely escape.

name: Celestio 64
description: A mod for Super Mario 64 inspired by Celeste, making it a 2D platformer with focus on precision.

name: Fun Run 4
description: Fun Run 4 takes the legendary gameplay of classic running race games and adds a new dimension of cool! Race against other real players while escaping obstacles, and sabotage your rival runners’ progress with cool powerups to WIN the race!

name: ImpliCations
description: The local island of cats needs your help building their city. Make houses, parks, and government buildings, then help them manage the ethical dilemmas that occur on the island. Save your island, snap a photo, and share it with your friends.

name: Operation Trust
description: A mini-RPG where you must transfer confidential information without being discovered by the villainous Mischeviants.

name: System City
description: A platformer set in the world inside your computer! Help the citizens of hardware and software city keep the machines operational.

name: EWorlds
description: Get ready for an intergalactic adventure in eWorlds! After a crash, you’re stuck on a tropical island. Grab the Loops to unlock the Space HUB, which will open up exciting worlds. Solve puzzles, dodge traps, and uncover mysteries, solo or with friends. Are you up for the legendary Golden Loop quest?

name: Monkey Fright
description:
National Institutes of Health (NIH) experimenter Elisabeth Murray has spent the last 30 years cutting open monkeys’ skulls, suctioning out or burning portions of their brains to cause permanent damage, and locking them in cages, where she shows them large rubber snakes and spiders, terrifying them. These horrific experiments haven’t advanced human health at all, of course—they’ve only tormented and killed animals and wasted precious medical resources.

This cruelty is why 16-year-old Archit Kumar of Dublin, California, is on a mission to end speciesism, and he’s developed a video game called Monkey Fright to help accomplish that. The game brings awareness to the constant suffering and deprivation that these monkeys experience inside small, barren cages in windowless laboratories—day in and day out—where they’re denied companionship, sunshine, fresh air, exercise, and everything else they care about.

name: Cage Fight
description:
Cage Fight is a parody of River City Ransom that pits MMA fighters against people who abuse animals.

Take control of real MMA fighters Jake Shields, Aaron Simpson, and Georgi Karakhanyan to see if you have the moves to foil a secret underground animal testing ring in PETA's game.

name: J. Lo: Fur Bully from the Block
description: PETA propaganda game originating sometime in the 2000s where the object is to avoid Jennifer Lopez and warn people of the dangers of making fur clothing.

name: Sprucerio
description: You went to the forest for a tree. You have a sled on which you transport the tree. A kettle with hot tea (so hot that it doesn't cool down to the end). Lantern and ax. Having cut down a tree, night has come, you return home through a dark forest.

name: Wheat Harvest Paradox
description: A psx style game where you harvest with a harvester. However, you do not live in an ordinary world, you live in a very gloomy and old giant city. Where all the inhabitants of this city are stuck in a time loop. Every day the direction of time changes. It can go both forward and in the opposite direction.

name: Fun Run
description:
Fun Run is an online real-time multiplayer game for smartphones and tablets. Play with your friends or get matched with random players from around the world!

Control a customizable character in a race against up to three other opponents in real time. There are two buttons to press, one to jump and the other to use any available power ups.

name: Treasure Island 2
description: Set your sails to the Caribbean! Step into the swashbuckling boots of an adventurer and escape to an exotic deserted island to loot pirates' buried treasure. Use your time wisely and match three or more treasures into lines - horizontal, vertical or diagonal. Do it right and the crazy pirate skeletons will do a jig just for you!

name: Pokémblem
description:
Fire Emblem is a tactics RPG that has been described as "anime chess".
This hack turns FE8 into a Pokémon game.

Re-live your journey through Kanto in this reimagining of Pokémon. Battle with your whole party at once, and devise strategies to take down the toughest foes. Catch and evolve the original 151 Pokémon as you train up your favorites. Enjoy balanced gameplay where grinding has little effect and swapping out team members may be the key if you’re struggling. You play your way in this fun, fast-paced game.

name: Why
description:
Why?

Why someone like you?

Why?

name: RollerCoaster Tycoon 3: Gold
description: Sin descripción

name: The Case of the City Botucaiba
description: The Case of the City Botucaiba is a mystery visual novel for the Sega Saturn about Renne Bras, a detective who travels to Botucaíba to investigate the mysteries surrounding the city. It was developed for the Museum of Tomorrow's "Habitable Cities" game jam.

name: New Years Eve Slaughter 2022
description: This wad contains 5 short slaughter-ish maps (plus 1 bookend map) that are all fairly difficult.

name: Pocket Slaughter
description:
The wad is divided into 5-map episodes, each with a different visual theme. There is some semblance of a difficulty curve, both within each episode and for the megawad in general. Certainly map 30 is a bit harder than map 1.

All difficulty settings are supported. UV is the primary difficulty for those who want a challenge, and HNTR was designed to be a more casual experience. HMP is somewhere in between and may not be as well balanced as the other two.

Pistol starts are enforced through MBF21 death exits. There are no secrets besides the exits on maps 15/31.

name: Moonblood
description: Moonblood is a 32-level megawad for Doom 2. It's split into 6 episodes and features small/medium-sized levels, vanilla mechanics, and a custom soundtrack. Its main inspirations were Scythe 1, Jenesis, Mano Laikas, and the DTWID series.

name: Exomoon
description: Exomoon (aka Moonblood X) is a megawad for Doom 2. The levels are a somewhat mix of the original Moonblood with some early BTSX levels twist on them, focusing in a mix of the ruins/temple theme with some exotic natural landscapes. Scythe and Mano Laikas also have a strong influence on this. It has been tested on zdoom 2.8 and prboom 2.5.1.3.

name: 180 Minutes Pour Vivre
description:
180 Minutes Pour Vivre is a collection of 32 new Doom II maps put together by the French Doom Community & friends.
Loosely following the recipe of the 3 Heures d'Agonie speedmapping series, this mapset makes use of a few extra assets to introduce a fresh, unusual, and definitely eerie setting.

name: Mapping at Warpspeed
description: Mapping at Warpspeed is a 32 map megawad created as the ninth edition of the Pineapple Under the Sea speedmapping series. Each map was made with a 10 hour time limit and with the rule of crossing UFOs over each level ﻿to provide a semblance of continuity﻿﻿.

name: Uprising
description:
Uprising is a narrative driven DOOM2 megawad for limit removing ports (tested on Crispy Doom). It features an extensive dehacked patch with changes to weapons and monsters, alongside varied maps and gameplay. You'll be fighting through wastelands, abandoned facilities, hellish installations, ruined cities, frozen techbases and beyond...

The intended difficulity is UV but all other skills are implemented. There is something for everyone, including maps dripping with atmosphere, non linear keyhunts, short shootouts, frantic slaughter and a few true epics. Don't worry if you're intimidated, the largest fights have been inundated with powerups on the lower difficulties to allow the budding tourist to explore safely.

name: Marswar
description:
You are a Martian terraformer stuck in a small station in the middle of nowhere.

Since the beginning of the terraforming project, the United Organizations of Earth have been threatening to take over. Recent events have prompted an invasion from Earth, only something went wrong with their new "space-warp" capable ships... that were built by some company with the initials "MS".

name: Anomaly Report
description: Anomaly Report is a brand-new 33-level megawad for vanilla Doom 2.

name: Strategic Mind: Fight for Dominance
description: Lead the German offensive and stand at the head of the Red Army in Strategic Mind: Fight for Dominance, a set that includes campaigns from the games Strategic Mind: Spectre of Communism and the previously unavailable Strategic Mind: Blitzkrieg.

name: Catan: Console Edition - Super Deluxe
description: Play the official video game of Catan on Console! On a board that comes to life, challenge friends locally or play the AI, then take these skills online with full cross-play compatibility! The Super Deluxe edition includes The Helpers, Championship Maps, Dice Skin & Hex Frames.

name: Lost Crystals
description: Unearth the hidden gems waiting to be discovered in the foggy valley. Immerse yourself in the calm and let the magic of Lost Crystals wash over you. Are you ready to embark on a tranquil adventure like no other?

name: Crystal Math
description: An infinite math runner with varying speeds and difficulty to test your skills.

name: Autofading Se Disparaître
description: This work uses virtual reality and non-linear sound composition technologies to poetically explore the presence of human beings in their environment. Immersed in a forest generated by point cloud data, which evolves according to their observational attitude and type of attention they give to it.

name: Méandres
description: Méandres proposes an incursion through the connections of white matter in a virtual reality experience. We move through this mysterious and labyrinthine universe of fibre bundles that encompass us like a forest to explore, but this fragile environment will be affected by our presence and behaviour.

name: Autumn Hike
description: Prepare to be captivated by the magic of nature as you embark on an unforgettable autumn journey. Are you ready to experience the beauty and serenity of the autumn forest in Autumn Hike? Lace up your boots and step into the adventure today!

name: Deceive Inc.: Neon Nights
description: Agent Hans gets a rude awakening when the ex-henchman who cut off his arm comes out of retirement! With his days of villainy behind him, new agent Sasori aims to bring Deceive Inc. into the future of corporate espionage.

name: Sizif
description: Sizif is a 3D endless runner where you simply control a ball and avoid obstacles to generate score for the longest time possible and climb the leaderboard. During a game you can unlock bonuses to either make your run easier or generate more score.

name: Crossroad of Worlds: Cursed Letters - Collector's Edition
description: Step out into the light! What do you do when someone intentionally steers you astray? Detectives of the Worlds' Edge agency are ever watchful. You have another task to accomplish - find out who could benefit from the stolen stars not returning to their rightful owners?

name: Yeerk Pool
description:
Yeerk Pool is an Animorphs arcade-style game, offered on the official Animorphs website.

Your challenge is to help Jake find his way through the maze to the Yeerk Pool. You can control Jake's movements with the arrow keys on your keyboard, or with the J-I-K-L keys.

As you find the colored keys, use them to free the gorillas from their matching-colored cages. Once you've released a gorilla, you can use its morph (by hitting the space bar) to help Jake chase off the controllers...but remember, you can only stay in the gorilla morph a limited time.

If you encounter any animals along the way, be sure to stop and collect them for extra points.

You have three chances to help Jake collect all the keys and release all the animals, which then allows Jake entry to the Yeerk Pool area, where you must help him find the Kandrona ray machine that feeds the Yeerks and destroy it. Warning: don't forget to stay away from any roaming Yeerk slugs and use Jake's gorilla morph (by hitting the space bar) to cross the Yeerk Pool.

At the end of the game, your points will be tallied, and you can proceed to the next level. Your game ends when you either run out of time or after you've exhausted all three Jakes. Play again to beat your score!

name: Hamboy: AutoChess Survivor
description: Hamboy is a rogue-like arena shooting game where you fight against aliens by strategically combining 12 attributes and 10 types of weapons to create synergies. As the waves increase, you'll realize that you shouldn't spend gold recklessly.

name: Hector The Cat: Treasure Hunter
description: Hector the Cat: Treasure Hunter is a rogue-lite action-adventure. Explore and battle your way through procedurally generated levels to gather as many Treasure you Can and become the Best Treasure Hunter.

name: Speedrunnerz
description: In this game, you will embark on various trails, each starting in a secure location. As you progress through the portals at the end of each trail, be prepared for increasing levels of difficulty. You are one of the best speedrunners out there!

name: Gutasaga
description: Gutasaga - 2D Strategy RPG pre-viking era game. Immerse yourself in the 550 - 600 AD saga. Be the Viking who opened trade routes with Constantinople. Encounter over 40 nations with unique cultures on your journey. Succeed in trading 205 historically recreated goods. Or try raids and piracy.

name: Capitals Quizzer: Countries Mode
description: Every capital of every country, with national flags.

name: Indigo
description: The Indigo mod for Ocarina of Time is an ambitious romhack that creates a new adventure focused on an alternate Hyrule in which you play as adult Link from the start.

name: Christmas Magic
description: Christmas Magic is a game where you fly on Santa’s sleigh above the streets in six different countries and drop Christmas presents for boys and girls on their chimneys in time while trying to avoid the scary Gargula from stealing the presents and ruining the night.

name: Throw Me To My Planet
description: A lost square trying to find his planet in a huge space. It's all about a square who wants to go to a planet and face consequences.

name: Melody Quest
description: Join our lovable protagonist on a magical adventure through vibrant landscapes, where music reigns supreme. As you journey through the fantastical realms, you'll encounter delightful creatures and charming companions, each with their own unique musical talents.

name: Daymare Town
description: DayMare Town – can you escape the nightmare of the day?

name: Gob!
description: Gob! is a turn-based shoot-em-up, made for the 7 day roguelike challenge: 7DRL 2017. Your quest is to get a high score.

• New characters: Tighnari, Collei and Dori
• New element: Dendro
• New region, Sumeru, with the Dharma Forest area
• New main story quests: Chapter III, Acts I & II
• New story quest for Tighnari

name: Airframe Ultra
description:
Welcome to the violent underground world of Ultra Circuit racing.

From the cracked asphalt of San Juaro and the Ysidro edgelands to the hulking megacities of the Texicali Zego zone, Airframe riders from all across the Southlands compete for fame, fortune, and a chance at glory… three feet above or six feet below.

description:

• New characters: Cyno, Nilou and Candace
• New areas: Hypostyle Desert, Land of Lower Setekh and Land of Upper Setekh
• New main story quests: Chapter III, Acts III & IV
• New story quests for Cyno and Nilou

name: Funny Park
description: Escape from HugoBoB using the Raygun on the toy factory! If you can!

name: Genshin Impact: Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises
description:
Version 3.2 of Genshin Impact, which included:

• New main story quests: Chapter III, Act V - Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises
• New story quests for Nahida
• New main event: Fabulous Fungus Frenzy
• …and more!

name: Tower! Simulator 3: EGLL Airport
description: A major international airport in London, England. Heathrow Airport is used by over 80 airlines flying to 185 destinations in 84 countries. The airport is the primary hub of British Airways and is a base for Virgin Atlantic. It has four passenger terminals and a cargo terminal.

name: Aikokuryuu no Memoria
description: A Japanese, indie RPG.

name: The Tower of the Spells
description: The Tower of the Spells is a medieval fantasy RPG with pixelated graphics. Accompany Samuel Critchlow during his student years at the magic academy The Tower of the Spells located on the continent of Margrast, a land with many secrets for him to discover.

name: Solar Systems For Kids
description: A family friendly casual game that teaches children about celestial bodies. Learn about the Sun, Earth, Jupiter, and the other celestial bodies that make up our Solar System. You or your child will also be able to create your own Solar System in a sleek and in-depth fashion!

name: One Deck Galaxy
description: Roll your dice and cleverly use them to build up your civilization from its humble homeworld, growing to create a Federation spanning countless star systems.

name: Magic Kaleidoscope
description: The Magic Kaleidoscope is an amazing anti-stress coloring game where you can become the creator of your own magical textures and animations.

name: Lakeburg Legacies: Supporter's Pack
description: Show your support to the developers and get exclusive portraits and clothes for your villagers, as well as the OST and a digital artbook for the game!

name: Capitals Quizzer: Currency Mode
description: Teach yourself the currencies of the world.

name: Capitals Quizzer: Landmarks Mode
description: Learn the location of famous landmarks around the world!

name: Capitals Quizzer: Regions Mode
description: Learn local regions and their capital cities.

name: 1001 Jigsaw. Castles And Palaces 5
description: Magnificent architecture and valiant warriors! Put the puzzles together and enjoy the atmosphere of the royal domain.

name: Genshin Impact: All Senses Clear, All Existence Void
description:
Version 3.3 of Genshin Impact, which included:
• New characters: Wanderer and Faruzan
• New gameplay system: Genius Inokation TCG
• New main story quests: Interlude Chapter, Act III - Inversion of Genesis
• New story quests for Wanderer
• New main event: Akitsu Kimodameshi
• …and more!

name: Jewel Fever
description:
You have unlimited time so you won´t be surprised by any "game over"-messages
You can move the jewels by tapping at the source and then at the target-position or just swiping!

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: The Drum Master! - One Piece Anime Songs Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Mimpi Volleyball
description:
Help Mimpi play some ball with the most fantastic creatures.
Enjoy distinctive, fantastic graphic of this minigame that is based on award winning Mimpi the game.

name: Moto Wheelie
description:
Trapped inside the memory banks of a computer, Maya needs to find a way out.
Her only ride.. a cyber motorcycle in a stunts game program. It's a long way to escape, but one that she is determined to enjoy with super fast wheelies, and stunt loops jumping over ramps on this endless data highway.

name: O-Void
description: Jump into the spinning circle of O-Void! In this super minimal action runner, you’ll be jumping over obstacles with the tap of a finger. But this is not a regular platformer! The entire level can change direction or flip upside down to throw you off. Are you skilled enough to survive every challenge?

name: Geo Gods
description:
Geo Gods is a solo card game which combines card drafting with a simple tile placing mechanic.
In Geo Gods you use the elemental magic of the Gods to create a godly garden. Each God faction comes with its own set of cards which you can strategically use to increase the score of each God. Activate the 6 elemental Power Crystals to gain even more score and create the perfect garden.

name: Frak
description: Challenge yourself or a friend to a game of Frak and see who has the fastest reactions.

name: Exo: Arena
description:
Exo: Arena turns a park or playing field into an augmented reality arena where you face off against your friends. Navigate virtual hazards as you run to avoid incoming fire. Bounce shots off virtual ricochets to surprise your opponents with blasts from behind. In Exo: Arena, your phone becomes your map and weapon. Last one standing wins.
Exo: Arena requires a big open space, a clear view of the sky, and a cellular data connection.

name: 9 Elements
description:
No common volleyball, it's rather be called a combat. Super combat volleyball!!
Get ready for the exciting 1 on 1, action sport! Characters of 9 different elements are waiting for your Fight Ball!

name: Treasure Island: The Golden Bug - Extended Edition
description:
1827 – William Legrand, son of a fallen family, came to Sullivan Island, South Carolina, to flee the misery.
Wandering on the island, he discovers a rare bug, made of gold. He uses a piece of paper to take it. At night, he draws the bug on this same piece of paper, as he is explaining the adventure to his friend Edgar, standing in front of the fireplace.
As William takes back the paper, he realises that symbols appeared on it. It must be an invisible ink, revealed by the heat. From that moment, William thinks it is a Pirate’s document: Captain Kidd’s coded instructions to his hidden treasure… Help William find it!

name: Genshin Impact: The Exquisite Night Chimes
description:
Version 3.4 of Genshin Impact, which included:
• New characters: Alhaitham and Yaoyao
• New area: Desert of Hadramaveth
• New outfits for Lisa and Kamisato Ayaka
• New story quest for Alhaitham
• New main event: The Exquisite Night Chimes
• …and more!

name: Satisgame
description:
A satisfying game for ultimate relaxation. Experience magical stress relief and comfort,
Potentially easing symptoms of OCD. The game features five categories: Tidying, jigsaw puzzles, anti-stress, puzzles, and mini-games.

name: Genshin Impact: Windblume's Breath
description:
Version 3.5 of Genshin Impact, which included:
• New characters: Dehya and Mika
• New main story quests: Chapter III, Act VI - Caribert
• New story quest for Dehya
• New hangout events for Faruzan
• New main event: Windblume's Breath
• …and more!

description:
Version 3.6 of Genshin Impact, which included:
• New characters: Baizhu and Kaveh
• New areas: Gavireh Lajavard and Realm of Farakhkert

Version 3.7 of Genshin Impact, which included:

description:
Version 3.8 of Genshin Impact, which included:
