name: Hayarigami 2 Portable: Keishichou Kaii Jiken File
description: You are part of the elite police force team. Find the culprit and his identity before he finds you. Investigate urban legends associated with bloody murders via scientific or occult methods leading to different results. And only combination of these methods can reveal the truth behind the case.

name: Hayarigami: Keishichou Kaii Jiken File
description: From chain mails that leads to murder, mysterious suicides and missing children, you, as a police officer have to put all your brain cells to work, connect the events together to discover the truth.

name: Psychic Eclipse: Reload
description:
First released for PC in November 2021, Psychic Eclipse centers on the main character, Kay Yorshka, who lives in a shelter for people with supernatural abilities known as the Dome. This Nintendo Switch port brings new voices and stills to the game.
The main scenario is written by ICHIHA, the writer of Nakigara no Tori and Beast x Light. Reo Uratani, who has created music for the Monster Hunter series, provided the opening song and Ichihara composed the game’s BGM.

name: Minna de Kuuki Yomi Koro-koro Comic Ver.
description: Sin descripción

name: Spoils of War
description: It was made by German Design Group in 1991 for DOS, C64, and Amiga, the game takes place on a different planet but is essentially an eco sim about colonization of the new world.

name: WCW/nWo Revenji
description: Sin descripción

name: Run Bunny Home
description:
Help the bouncing bunny get home, jumping from platform to platform, pick up eggs, eat carrots, and bounce balloons, pick up your baby bunnies to get points along the way. Do not fall off the boards as you get home.
The game has 16 levels, after you make it to the bunny house you pass a level, and the next level is unlocked.
The higher levels get harder, you need to jump higher to make it, and it is easier to fall. The platforms are shorter, and some of them are rickety and will fall down when you jump on them.
You can skip a level if you have earned enough stars in the game, even if you don't pass a level, this can help if you just can't finish one level.
The game is supported by ads, but there is an in app purchase to turn all the ads off. There is another version of this game Run Bunny Kids that has no ads, no in app purchases, no videos, and all levels are unlocked for easy use by kids.
You can buy extra carrots with an in app purchase, but these are the same as the carrots you pick up in the game.
You can also get extra bunnies buy watching videos if you want, these can be traded in the store for extra lives, the adopt button watches those videos to get bunnies. Trade bunnies for extra lives in the store.
You should bring the baby bunnies you find along the platforms home with you instead, if you bounce into a baby bunny it comes with you. Get your baby bunnies home with you, and you earn those baby bunny points. Every 5 points gets you an extra life in the store.
After every game you can get to the store with the store icon, or you can get to the store when you pause the game with the pause icon by pushing the || sign during the game. If you press the + sign on the top of the purse, you go to the store.

name: Trollface Quest 5
description: The fifth game in the Trollface Quest series. In this game the player needs to avoid getting trolled and solve 20 levels on unusual ways to win the Futball Trollcup.

name: Cooking Pix
description: CookingPix is an online cooking card game for 1-5 players.You can enjoy simple yet deep strategy building and bargaining.You can play many times in a short time, so even people who don't have time can enjoy it easily!

name: Mandew vs. The Forever Rain+
description: After 13 years, one of the first Suits & Sandals games is back with a fresh coat of paint! Help Mandew uncover the source of the mysterious never-ending downpour threatening his home in this 2D platforming adventure.

name: WooLoop: Urban Pack
description: This Urban-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Each image is of various urban lifestyle times, builders and iconography! Explore what the big city has to offer!

name: Prodigious Avian
description: Prodigious Avian is a casual game, where you play as Quercus thy magnanimous and attempt to evade the malignant clutches of the Robber Baron, who threatens to engulf you and all of Cymru. Flap your wings little birdie and do not allow the talons of an insidious wretch to besmirch your fair visage.

name: Bubble Burst: PlayWithPlanets
description:
Bubble pairing and popping takes a new dimension in this game. Pair similar planets in a dial and see how much you can pop in a minute or more.
Easy controls and special effects make this game and awesome time killer.
Multiple levels in this game is a plus point and each level gives you a new experience every time you play.

name: Second World War
description: Sin descripción

name: Puky
description: Who Is Master?! Come on !! Help Puky be a competent watch dog.

name: Nala Cat
description:
Join the world's most famous cat on Instagram, Nala Cat, on her adventure with her squad! Nala has escaped to an adventurous, magical land to have a “play date” with her family! Hop down tricky paths and slide down rivers to help Nala and her squad find the correct way home, but watch out!....not every path leads to victory! Catch Nala's favorite items like toilet paper to clear obstacles, and chickens to unlock her whole lovable crew!
Play for hours in this endless downhill adventure, challenge yourself to take the throne in the leaderboards, and become the top cat out there!
Nala's lovable squad consist of White Coffee, Luna Rose, Steve & Stella, and Spencer The Dog!

name: Happy Burger
description:
Jump, Burger, Jump!!
Bounce through the sky with the Happy Jump Burger, back for a solo adventure!
Tap the screen to jump, hold to jump further.
Endless fun, with exciting obstacles, gold to collect, and accessories to wear!

name: Alchimia
description: After 10 long years of studying you can finally fulfill your dreams - opening your own potion shop. Ludum Dare 51 game.

name: Too Hot to Handle 2 Netflix
description: More choices, bigger drama. Get ready to get hotter in the new season of Netflix's spicy interactive story game based on the hit reality series. Go for love or risk it all by breaking Lana's infamous rules of romance. Change up your look and mingle with a new batch of sizzling singles on a paradise island in this interactive story game. Can you feel the love — and heat — in the air?

name: Dragster Mayhem: Top Fuel Sim
description:
Experience the thrill of piloting a nitro-methane guzzling Top Fuel drag car producing over 9000 bhp on the iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch!
Wait for the three yellows and throttle down in the blink of an eye as you cover 1000 ft in less than 5 seconds.
Race on 4 different race tracks with increasing prize money. Win races and earn money to improve your dragsters chassis, engine and tires.

name: Beachside Bites: Sip & Munch
description: Welcome to Beachside Bites, the ultimate culinary adventure on the sunny shores! Get ready to tantalize taste buds, serve hungry beachgoers, and create mouthwatering treats in this exciting beachside restaurant game. As the sole character, it's up to you to run the show, from crafting delicious burgers, ice cream, drinks, pops, ice cream sandwiches, and cakes to personally delivering them to your satisfied customers.

name: Stuart Jump
description: Welcome to Stuart's world!

name: UpUp: Frozen Adventure
description:
UpUp is a frozen adventure. A platform game incredibly fun and addictive!!
In the game, you are an adventurer who need to run to reach the highest point of the mountain, facing snow and extreme cold. Time is your biggest enemy, you need to be quick to not freeze and die of cold. His agility is also important to face deadly and dangerous geysers and spikes.
UpUp offers an extremely simple mechanics, but very challenging. Besides having fun for hours, you can challenge your friends to see who will be the first to reach the highest point of the mountain.

name: Super Sushi Smackdown
description:
Battle powerful samurais, pesky ninjas and flirtatious geishas... but don't forget there's plenty of sushi to be served in the highly addictive Super Sushi Smackdown.
Super Sushi Smackdown is an action-packed puzzle game that will test both your reflexes and your wit. Keep the customers happy by serving them sushi, but make sure to demonstrate your masterful skills by building up extreme chains and never-ending combos. Complete tricky challenges to level up and discover the powerful skills that hide within you.
Fun for the entire family, Super Sushi Smackdown has plenty to challenge the reflexes and wit of hardened gamers and casual fun-seekers alike.
Who would have thought a day in the life of a sushi waiter would be so addictive?

name: Suck Eggs!
description:
All you have to do is suck eggs located on top of scrolling columns at random heights.
Includes 4 game modes that increase in difficulty. Eggs that you can suck include chocolate eggs, red eggs or golden eggs!

name: BloodyXmas 2010
description:
BloodyXmas is a superb survival game for your iPhone and iPod Touch! Here comes the funniest, funnest Christmas ever!
This festive season, in such a joyous family time, even the kindest grandpa in the world has to start his chainsaw!
Creatures are rushing into Santa's workshop and they want to steal and destroy all the presents!
What can poor Santa do? How can he stop these evil minions?
Yeah, guess what - he kicks their asses and teaches them a lesson!
Here comes the funniest, funnest Christmas ever!
Check out Santa's arsenal: cleaver, saber, sledgehammer, chainsaw, and one massive secret super weapon. No one's gonna steal the children's presents! Come and get some!

name: Ace Fishing: Crew
description:
Enjoy fishing and the underwater scenery with your Crew! Ace Fishing: Crew!
Alone or together, it's enjoyable!

From the thrilling feeling of fishing while observing the movements of fish underwater, to the fun of cooking and selling the fish you catch!
Experience the life of an angler in Ace Fishing: Crew.

name: Crossy Road+
description: Hop back into the adventure with Crossy Road re-imagined for Apple Arcade. Collect all the characters & discover Crossy Road park.

name: Dumb Ways to Climb
description: Get ready for a game that'll make you question all your life choices! Introducing "Dumb Ways to Climb" - the incredibly unimpressive creation that miraculously appeared in just one week! Watch in awe as our brilliant Bean aimlessly climbs on random stuff, reaching for the stars... well, kind of.

name: Temporal War
description:
In 2027, on parallel Earth 103. The Red Army implemented a full blockade on the Tech Island to obtain control of chip technology and global dominance.
To counter the Red Army, the Tech Island allies formed the Blue Army, sparking intense warfare on the island and its surrounding waters...

name: Into the Twilight
description:
Featured in New & Noteworthy, What We're Playing, What's Hot, and Number 1 in category in 15 countries.
Run, jump & roll!
Can you escape into the Twilight? Run, jump, roll and swing to avoid drops. traps, and enemies while you collect stars in the fastest time possible. Play through increasingly difficult levels in this furiously fun platformer with beautiful graphics and music.

name: Spin a Stick
description: Spin-a-Stick is a maze puzzle game with a twist. Just swipe your finger and guide your spinner thru levels to find a way out. Press and swipe anywhere to move. Avoid hitting anything.

name: Pocket Family: My Dream House
description:
Design your home and create a dream house in Pocket Family! Create a virtual family filled with adorable animated characters and help build the house of their dreams through match 3 collapse games and puzzles.
Build a family with an amazingly cute and fun cast of characters that are ready to move in and live in your new house! Play puzzle games to complete their requests for household items and keep your home happy and growing!
Play match 3 collapse games to design and build each room any way you please. Decorate your room and watch the furnishings grow, or help your new virtual family with their requests.

name: Run Kelvin: Penguin Escape
description:
A little baby penguin named "Kelvin", who does not know how to swim yet, was left behind and now needs to run and escape to his family and safety.
During his run in Antarctica, he has to do his bit to fight pollutants left by human activities and clean up the environment to reduce a few degrees Kelvin (or Celsius/Fahrenheit) as for him, melting ice is not just about rising sea levels and global warming, it is not being able to see his family ever again in the changing landscape.
Run, jump, even try and fly he must, but at the same time avoid his natural enemies and hit back at the man-made ones.

name: Bumper Ball
description:
Bumper Ball is coming!
You can eliminate balls by clicking and moving five or more same color balls into a line. The game is over when you cannot move any ball or board is fully filled by balls.

name: Trollface Quest: Sports
description: The sixth installment of the Trollface Quest series in which the player needs to solve puzzles by avoiding trolls. This game contains 10 levels to sharp your fitness.

name: The Frozen Garden
description: The Frozen Garden is a third-person horror game inspired by classic survival horror that will immerse you in an intriguing and unsettling world.

name: Elysium Trials
description: Skill-based Fantasy Shooter on rails with an Epic touch, how you defeat enemies matter! Shoot, unleash powerful lightning magic, and Dragons, beware of dragons as you battle through 8 unique enemies all with unique attacks in vastly different worlds with an epic fantasy rock/metal soundtrack.

name: Police Car Escape Simulator
description: Are you ready for the multi-directional chase of the cops? Experience an adrenaline-filled police game with Police Car Escape Simulator. Escape, crash and beat the cops in fast vehicles!

name: Flying Cut
description: Sin descripción

name: VR Thrills
description: Sin descripción

name: Hiker: Heropack Creed
description: Sin descripción

name: Volatility
description:
Explore an interconnected world unfolding as you acquire new abilities, each region brimming with secrets to uncover as you learn your purpose in a collapsing artificial world.
Volatility is a Zelda-like with metroidvania elements, which sees you navigating a bizarre landscape in search of a way home.

name: Bounce & Roll
description: Control and guide the ball through a series of obstacles, testing your skills and abilities in a 3D environment, either solo or with a friend.

name: Cranky Driller
description: Mr. Driller just got Cranky!

name: Wall World: Deep Threat
description: Welcome to Deep Threat, a Wall World story expansion! With it you'll get to explore a remote section of the Wall which holds traces of a distant past. But you will have to fight for answers, and not only with the new types of Zyrex: other inhabitants of the Wall are also not too keen on parting with their secrets.

name: Trollface Quest: Sports
description: This game combines the fourth, fifth and sixth game of the Trollface Quest series into a single game on mobile devices. In a total of 50 levels the player competes in sport challenges to try winning trophies and avoiding trolls.

name: Trollface Quest: TrollTube
description: Trollface Quest is a game series in which the player needs to solve levels on unusual ways to avoid trolls. This game focuses on 10 levels based on famous YouTube memes.

name: Trollface Quest: Internet Memes
description: Trollface Quest is a series of games in which the player needs to solve levels on unusual ways to avoid trolls. This game features 10 levels based on Internet memes.

name: Jetpack Kiwi
description: Jetpack Kiwi is a classic 2D side scrolling shoot em up game featuring 20 levels, 5 bosses, hordes of enemies spaceships, with multiple characters to choose from; each one with an unique special attack. Complete the game in single player or with a friend in local co-op!

name: Alfredo's Sneaky Meal
description: Alfredo's Sneak Meal is a stealth platform arcade game where, armed only with a frying pan, you have to help Alfredo get his meal in a building full of zombies and bats.

name: Trollface Quest 13
description: In Trollface Quest 13 the player needs to solve levels thirteen levels on unusual ways to avoid trolls.

name: The Light Ahead
description: A simple story about a dark year punctuated by moments of beauty.

name: I am a Serial Killer
description:
Martin decided to join a sect called "The Enlightened", who seek to bring to life a mysterious being to eliminate all evil in the world.

How far are you able to go to achieve your goals?

name: Moorhuhn Total 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Dimensionals
description: Dimensionals is an RPG that combines fast paced, action packed tactics with deep rogue-like replayability. Collect powerful heroes and fight epic bosses. Every run is unique, so equip your heroes carefully to pull off insane combos. Dimensionals is a total reimagining of the rogue-like genre!

name: Heli-Shooter
description: Electro-mechanical helicopter flight-sim arcade game released by Sega in 1977.

name: Dark Tales: Edgar Allan Poe's The Black Cat
description: Go on an adventure with Inspector Dupin! Monsieur Mark Davies has reported his wife, Sara, missing and now it’s up to you to track her down and solve the mystery! Follow a mysterious black cat, who seems to be purposely helping you, and discover helpful clues in Dark Tales: Edgar Allen Poe’s The Black Cat. Use your Hidden Object talents to tackle the case, and discover the evil culprit behind Sara’s disappearance.

name: Deep Sea
description: Deep Sea is a standalone release of the Deep Sea pinball table, originally included in the game Epic Pinball.

name: Enigma
description: Enigma is a standalone release of the Enigma pinball table, originally included in the game Epic Pinball.

name: Jungle Pinball
description:
Jungle is a standalone release of the Jungle pinball table, originally included in the game Epic Pinball.

The table is a tribute to Epic's earlier game Jill of the Jungle.

name: Pot of Gold
description:
Pot of Gold is a standalone release of the Pot of Gold pinball table, originally included in the game Epic Pinball.

The table was designed by Terry Cumming.

name: Crash & Burn
description: Crash & Burn is a standalone release of the Crash & Burn pinball table, originally included in the game Epic Pinball.

name: Death Under Tuscan Skies: A Dana Knightstone Novel
description: Journey across Italy as best-selling novelist Dana Knightstone in Death Under Tuscan Skies: A Dana Knightstone Novel! During a lecture in a university in Tuscany, you are startled by the ghost of a 19th century girl named Eva. Decades ago, she died of a mysterious illness while her lover Giovanni left to find a cure. Why did he never return? Unravel the mystery of his disappearance as you explore beautiful landscapes in this incredible Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

name: Death Under Tuscan Skies: A Dana Knightstone Novel - Collector's Edition
description:
Journey across Italy as best-selling novelist Dana Knightstone in Death Under Tuscan Skies: A Dana Knightstone Novel! During a lecture in a university in Tuscany, you are startled by the ghost of a 19th century girl named Eva. Decades ago, she died of a mysterious illness while her lover Giovanni left to find a cure. Why did he never return? Unravel the mystery of his disappearance as you explore beautiful landscapes in this incredible Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

The Collector’s Edition includes:

Bonus gameplay
Integrated Strategy Guide
Stunning Soundtrack

name: Path of Exile: Crucible
description:
In Path of Exile: Crucible, you'll learn about the ancient titans who once shaped the primordial surface of Wraeclast. If you're powerful enough, you will earn the ability to forge their power onto your weapons.

Our April expansion introduces the Crucible challenge league, nine new Vaal Skills, Atlas Gateways, over ten new Unique Items and improvements to Breach, Abyss, Passive Tree Masteries, the Saboteur, the Pathfinder, Ruthless and much more!

name: Gainax Renzoku Satsujin Jiken: Ero
description: Main character is a new editor who participates in Gainax new game planning meeting in the mountains. However, as soon as team gathers, storm breaks out cutting way back. Meanwhile, Gainax staff members start to get killed one after another. Can protagonist find a criminal and develop special relations with staff girls under these circumstances?

name: DOOM 87: The Lost World
description: "DOOM 87: The Lost World" is an upcoming vanilla-compatible DOOM II megawad. The first few maps are fairly easy, but the difficulty increases significantly by the start of the Hell episode on MAP12. Currently, a 21-map beta release is available and features some epic vanilla DOOMING action! Get ready for an exciting new adventure as Doomguy locates a secret hellspawn base on Earth known as "The Lost World."

name: Blights Wrath
description:
Hack and Slash RPG in the world of Zeontis.

Level up and improve your combat finesse with magic, melee arts and ranged skills.
Improve your armory with thousands of items and fight your way through the hordes of demons and undead to save Zeontis.

name: Indigo Park
description: Indigo Park is an immersive first-person exploration game that takes you on a thrilling journey through the eerie remnants of an abandoned amusement park. As the protagonist, you will step into the shoes of an adventurous soul eager to uncover the mysteries hidden within this once vibrant and lively attraction.

name: Dungeons of Blood and Dream
description: Play as a mighty blood wizard on a quest to escape a death-loop of psychedelic dungeons. Slay disgusting creatures with a large array of bladed weapons and unnerving spells, harness the power of cursed rings, find mysterious treasures, and learn the secrets of the universe you are trapped in.

name: Lilith + Eve
description: Garden of Eden-inspired story about Adam who chases after angels, Eve who can't find her place in Elysium, and a lesser demon of the lilitu species — Lilith.

name: Please Don't Hate Christmas
description: You haven't celebrated Christmas for years. This year, you decided to return to your hometown—Snowflake Island, with your childhood friend, Albert. Albert treats you so well that you choose to stay forever. However, you forgot something in the past, and it's still not solved...

name: Mystic Messenger: April Fool's 2017 DLC
description: One extra April Fool's-themed day of gameplay that culminate in three new endings. Released along with update 1.7.0 in celebration of Zen's birthday.

name: Casio Mario World
description: An extremely hard hack.

name: My Summer Adventure: Memories of Another Life
description: A strange incident turns the life of an ordinary young man upside down when, having fallen asleep on a regular train commute, he wakes up in another country... in a body of a Japanese student! An unforgettable summer adventure awaits, promising many fateful meetings and momentous occasions.

name: Family Guy: Stewie 2.0
description:
You are Stewie.

Wanting to accelerate your plans of offing your mother and crushing Europe under a tyrannical bootie, you turn to the mad science of self-cloning.

But you were too successful! Your clone, Stewie 2.0, hates your family even more than you do and steals them away to a secret base hidden deep within "siburbia"!

Liberate your family by infiltrating "siburbia" and combating your clone's evil army with your own mechanical horde.

Victory shall be yours!

name: Family Feud
description:
Experience the exciting classic gameplay of one of America’s hottest gameshows at home now!
Customize your character, then challenge your friends, family, and even other players online for a chance to bring the big prize home.

name: Sex Rhythm: Onsen
description: Sex Rhythm: Onsen is a rhythm game where you getting affection from girls. 3 colleagues came to your hotel, a distant hotel, for a vacation, considering how tired they are in your hands, how they will spend this vacation. Good or bad.

name: Florida Love Stories
description: “Florida Love Stories is a romantic comedy point-and-click adventure and yuri dating sim. Play as investigative journalist Veronica Hernandez as she explores the town of Boca Castor, meets beautiful women and maybe even falls in love along the way.

name: Quickclaw
description: Quickclaw is a 2d action/platform fully handmade with sprite animations. Take on the role of Dynamo City's newest vigilante Quickclaw in her fight against organized crime with an original storyline and many new characters in order to give the experience to play into an animated series from the 90s!

name: Neural Nexus
description: Neural Link Corporation developed a powerful AI that unexpectedly went rogue. As an employee, you must destroy the servers storing the AI's network model to mitigate the damage and uncover the reasons behind the AI's loss of control.

name: Healer
description: This is a single-player action roguelike game in which you play the role of a doctor, select a disease from various medical records, and control various human immune guards equipped with various core weapons to enter various human body parts and fight against various pathogens.

name: Eternal Afterlife
description: Part of the Dream Mate series brought to you by Story Taco and Buff Studios, Eternal Afterlife is a modern fantasy romance game where you make the choice. Jump into a new universe that you've never experienced for a thrilling and seductive love story.

name: Ben 10: Power of the Omnitrix
description: Sin descripción

name: Ayakashibito: Genyou Ibunroku Portable
description: PSP port released in 2009.

name: Trapped Part One: The White Rabbit
description: A man wakes up in an unfamiliar house the day after his separation. Beside him is a dead man. Now he will have to find out where he is, how he got there, why he is there, who the mystery man is and how and why he died.

name: The Oni Taiji: Mezase! Nidaime Momotarou
description: The Oni Taiji: Mezase! Nidaime Momotarou is a PS1 game, developed by Prism Inc. and published by Nippon Ichi Software, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Nautical Dispute
description: Retro nostalgic big voyage game, dream back to the road of great voyage! Exploration, management, trade, piracy and war are constant topics. With wisdom and luck, gradually build a powerful fleet. Set sail, take the Golden Silk Road again, and reproduce the great voyage!

name: MagicBeans
description: An action role-playing game. The plot is full of ups and downs, innovative gameplay, and lively battles, including treasure hunting, seaside leisure hunting, and tower defense elements. I believe it can bring you unexpected surprises.

name: Mean Beans: Gotta Have It Hat Pack
description: Drown your bean in drip with these 15 crazy hats!

name: Mean Beans: Party Hat Pack
description: Drown your bean in some sweet drip with these 15 awesome cosmetics!

name: Mean Beans: I Paid Money For This Pack
description: The most exclusive bean drip there is! Show everyone you spent $20 of these sweet tricked-out bumper cars!

name: Mean Beans: Manly Hat Pack
description: Fight your friends in style with these 15 crazy hats!

name: Rat Catcher
description: Embark on a perilous journey as a fearless rat catcher in this nostalgic 90's-inspired dungeon crawler horror game. Explore dark and treacherous dungeons, facing off against horrifying monsters and collecting an array of eerie rats. Can you survive the darkness and emerge as the ultimate hero?

name: Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 3
description: Boost your "Gnome Enchanted Jigsaw Puzzles" experience with this DLC. Unlock 16 new intriguing gnome-themed puzzles, each offering a unique challenge and a glimpse into the captivating world of gnomes. Immerse, engage, and explore more!

name: DCS World: UH-1H The Huey Last Show Campaign by SorelRo
description: The Huey Last Show is a story-based campaign that will test your skills as a helicopter pilot, in 15 missions you will be facing various challenges and various missions while confronting the forces of the Soviet Union.

name: Seduce Her Harem
description: Play as Vera, the young Shadow Empress in this choice-driven Dating Sim Visual Novel. Meet, seduce, and... play with the five mythical men of this reverse harem! Come in now, don't be shy...

name: Soulbind: Tales of the Underworld
description: It's up to you to become the Endless, a mysterious skeleton, and embark on a perilous journey. Collect monster body parts to enhance your character and use a variety of abilities. Explore sinister locations, fight mythical creatures and uncover the secrets of the Underworld.

name: Grandma's Legacy VR: The Mystery Puzzle Solving Escape Room Game
description: Mystery, puzzle solving, challenges and secrets surround your grandmother's disappearance. Explore the different rooms and unravel the unsolved secret that your grandma keeps in Grandma's Legacy. Check our first escape room experience in VR.

name: Turbo Snow Skiing
description: Ski your way through several snow covered mountain levels as fast as you can but be careful to land on your skis or you will wipeout with ragdoll physics. Tilt your device to lean your rider and perform flips. Press the turbo button to fire up the jet turbine attached to your skis for a burst of speed. Hit the nitro turbo boost canisters all around the levels for an even greater speed burst. Navigate your way to the finish line using hidden ice caves for shortcuts. Try the stunt levels which test your skills in performing as many backflips or frontflips as you can. Find and unlock hidden levels throughout the game.

name: Parks and Rekt
description:
You got fired from your job at the "Parks and Recreation" department. In a fit of rage, you took your ex-employer's vehicle and wreck havoc on all the parks in the city.
Standing in your way are the city's air drone guards. Crash and destroy as many public park property as you can before those pests get to you.
You might not be employed at "Parks and Recreation" anymore, so let this be your chance to "redecorate" the city's parks for one last time.

name: Hill Dirt Master 3
description: Experience thrills of off-road racing by Hill Dirt Master 3. Large selection of challenges and upgradeable parts offer you a varied racing experience.

name: Renegade Racing
description: Complete various missions as you race through 18 adrenaline-packed stages, unlocking and upgrading 12 different vehicles along the way!

name: Cobi Shoot
description:
Take aim and get ready for awesome shooting action!
Have fun and challenge yourself or play with all your friends to see who's the best!

name: Soccer Clicker
description: Tap your way to glory! Collect cash, recruit players, and manage your team as you battle against real opponents from all over the world.

name: Make Dogs in Temple Jump 2020
description: Make the three dogs jump over the obstacles while they are running!
